title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Common Fisheries
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Common Fisheries 

Policy) (Bluefin Tuna) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (common fishery policy) (bluefin tuna) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries 

(Common Fisheries Policy)(Bluefin Tuna) 
Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 680 of 2016) are amended in Regulation 3(1) by the 
insertion after “20 November 2015” in the definition of “Commission Delegated 
Regulation” of the following: “and by Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2019/2200 of 10 July 2019”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 September, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [497] 3

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Instrument is to amend the Sea-Fisheries (Common Fisheries 
Policy) (Bluefin Tuna) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 680 of 2016) to ensure that 
full effect is given to certain provisions of EU law insofar as by catch of blue fin 
tuna is concerned. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [497]
